name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toll Audit and Fleet Analytics Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping Turo hosts make better business decisions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Empowering Turo hosts by transforming standard CSV data from your Turo business into comprehensive fleet insights and automating toll fee audits to identify unpaid charges, enabling data-driven decisions and ensuring accurate financial management.

IMPORTANT FOR EXTENSION TO WORK WITH CURRENT VERSION:
When uploading toll data, please use these column titles for your data.

Vehicle
Transaction Date - The day the toll was incurred, NOT the posted date
Transaction Amount - The toll amounts should be in this column (ex. -$1.25)
Location - Where the toll transaction took place
Plate - License Plate Number of Vehicle (VERY IMPORTANT)
Transaction ID - Transaction number for that specific toll fee (if available)
